response.overview: "Rediscover" is a short film about four young people who understand the importance of valuing the past and human relationships. Rediscovering is understanding that we are reborn from our own strength, our own light, and our own faith
response.tagline: "Rediscover" is a short film about four young people who understand the importance of valuing the past and human relationships. Rediscovering is understanding that we are reborn from our own strength, our own light, and our own faith.
response.title: Redescobrir
